svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 7, 2024" date: "2024-12-07"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
* Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #201): Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet :
97% participation, client teams fixing issues Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch
devnet before the holidays EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed,
agree async EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss
on testing call which devnet to add to EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not
included for now, discuss at RollCall (L2 standards) & consensus layer call (ACDC) next
week EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively include History expiry
plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70 protocol needed
(EIP7639) All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status
and non-consensus changing EIPs can be included in upgrade Meta EIPs
* Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues
Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the holidays EIP2537 BLS
precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async EIP7623 increase calldata
cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing call which devnet to add to
EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not included for now, discuss at RollCall (L2
standards) & consensus layer call (ACDC) next week
Pectra upgrade:
* Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues
Mekong testnet : 97% participation, client teams fixing issues
* Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the holidays
Pectra-devnet-5 spec : ideally launch devnet before the holidays
* EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async
EIP2537 BLS precompile: 2-3x gas cost increase proposed, agree async
* EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing
call which devnet to add to
EIP7623 increase calldata cost: scheduled for inclusion in Pectra, discuss on testing
* EIP7762 increase min blob base fee : not included for now, discuss at RollCall (L2
* EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively include
EIP4803 limit transaction gas : proposed to retroactively include
* History expiry plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70
protocol needed (EIP7639)
History expiry plan : pre-merge expiry set for May 1, discussed if new eth/70 protocol
needed (EIP7639)
* All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status and
non-consensus changing EIPs can be included in upgrade Meta EIPs
All Core Devs process improvements : added Declined for Inclusion EIP status and
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Client testing call #15 : Mekong testnet deposit processing fixed and Pectra-devnet-5
spec discussions
Client testing call #15 : Mekong testnet deposit processing fixed and Pectra-devnet-5
* Pectra system contracts for consolidations, withdrawals & block hash lookup; used
instead of precompiles, implemented in Assembly
Pectra system contracts for consolidations, withdrawals & block hash lookup; used
Amsterdam upgrade
* Stateless implementers call #28 (formerly Verkle): file based approach for preimage
distribution and implementation in progress of EIP7736 leaf-level state expiry
Layer 1
* Bandwidth availability shows reasonable to increase blob count
Bandwidth availability shows reasonable to increase blob count
* EVMMAX implementers call #1 : Poseidon planned as first use case
EVMMAX implementers call #1 : Poseidon planned as first use case
For stakers
* Slashing event : 21 validators slashed for attestation violation
Slashing event : 21 validators slashed for attestation violation
* SOLO : proposal for liquid staking using portion of stake unlikely to be lost,
without needing governance, trusted hardware or permissioned operator sets
SOLO : proposal for liquid staking using portion of stake unlikely to be lost, without
needing governance, trusted hardware or permissioned operator sets
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind
~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client
bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported
data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
* Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states)
for more compact archive nodes, downgrading requires resync Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster
forward sync, experimental light client-based sync (testing only) and fixes config
mismatch errors for unscheduled upgrades
* Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states) for more compact
archive nodes, downgrading requires resync
Lighthouse v6.0.0 : hierarchical state diffs (on-disk tree states) for more compact
* Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster forward sync, experimental light client-based sync (testing
only) and fixes config mismatch errors for unscheduled upgrades
Nimbus v24.11.0 : faster forward sync, experimental light client-based sync (testing
Layer 2
* Arbitrum Connect : interface for users to force include transactions during sequencer
downtime
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF
EIP7833 : Scheduled function calls EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF
EIP7830 : Contract size limit increase for EOF
* EIP7833 : Scheduled function calls
EIP7833 : Scheduled function calls
* EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
EIP7834 : Separate metadata section for EOF
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT
collections ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method ERC7836 : Wallet call
preparation API
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing
ERC7831 : Multi-chain addressing
* ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT collections
ERC7832 : Sustainable NFT collections
* ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method
ERC7835 : wallet_transmitCrossChainIntents method
* ERC7836 : Wallet call preparation API
ERC7836 : Wallet call preparation API
Stuff for developers
* Foundry: forge build 10-36% faster compilation, forge coverage 2x faster
Foundry: forge build 10-36% faster compilation, forge coverage 2x faster
* Hardhat v2.22.17 : adds Solidity v0.8.28 support
Hardhat v2.22.17 : adds Solidity v0.8.28 support
* Ape v0.8.21 (Python contract framework): faster console launch & auto fork chains
Ape v0.8.21 (Python contract framework): faster console launch & auto fork chains
* Frangio: Solidity learnings & working on EVML (EVM language)
Frangio: Solidity learnings & working on EVML (EVM language)
* Tornado Cash reference manual : architecture, Circom circuit, Solidity contracts and
client side proof generation & verification
Tornado Cash reference manual : architecture, Circom circuit, Solidity contracts and
* eth_simulateV1 explainer : standardized approach for multicall via JSON-RPC
eth_simulateV1 explainer : standardized approach for multicall via JSON-RPC
* Rotki balance scanner (Vyper): query ETH/token balances, deployed on mainnet & L2s
Rotki balance scanner (Vyper): query ETH/token balances, deployed on mainnet & L2s
* Drift (create cached contract calls): adds hooks
Drift (create cached contract calls): adds hooks
* Safe owner manager : manage Safe multisig owners & thresholds in bulk
Safe owner manager : manage Safe multisig owners & thresholds in bulk
Security
* Vestra $500k exploit on mainnet
Vestra $500k exploit on mainnet
* Clipper (DEX) $460k exploit on Optimism & Base
Clipper (DEX) $460k exploit on Optimism & Base
* Spectral Syntax v2 $200k exploit on Base via infinite approval
Spectral Syntax v2 $200k exploit on Base via infinite approval
* ETH Rangers , $25k stipend from EF for public goods security work, December 20
deadline
ETH Rangers , $25k stipend from EF for public goods security work, December 20 deadline
Job Listings
* Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
* Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
* Nethermind: AI Agent , Infra , Blockchain , Full Stack , BizDev & Researcher
Nethermind: AI Agent , Infra , Blockchain , Full Stack , BizDev & Researcher
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.1 gwei 2.7k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
Gas: 4.5 to 202.4 gwei, 20.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.1 gwei
* 2.7k ETH net issuance this week
2.7k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $3,543 - $4,089, currently $4,022, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,543 - $4,089, currently $4,022, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.04 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.04 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Ecosystem
* EF Q3 grantees share $12.8 million in funding
EF Q3 grantees share $12.8 million in funding
* Public goods dashboards share $250k via quadratic voting at Devcon
Public goods dashboards share $250k via quadratic voting at Devcon
Enterprise
* Wyoming stable token commission: request for qualifications to support state issued
USD backed stablecoin, deadline December 12
Notable at app layer
* Vitalikâ€™s ideal wallet : cross-L2, secure from users & wallet devs, private
transfers, store private data, secure chain access & keystores
Vitalikâ€™s ideal wallet : cross-L2, secure from users & wallet devs, private transfers,
store private data, secure chain access & keystores
* ENS DAO grants : $12-50k for public goods projects
ENS DAO grants : $12-50k for public goods projects
Regulation/business/tokens
* Paul Atkins to be nominated as SEC Chair; David Sacks to be White House AI & crypto
czar
Paul Atkins to be nominated as SEC Chair; David Sacks to be White House AI & crypto
* Coinbase obtained FDICâ€™s requests for banks to pause crypto activities
Coinbase obtained FDICâ€™s requests for banks to pause crypto activities
* Alex Mashinsky (former Celsius CEO) pleaded guilty to fraud
Alex Mashinsky (former Celsius CEO) pleaded guilty to fraud
General
* XT exchange $1M stolen
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-december-7-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Dec 9 â€“ EF internships 2025 application deadline
Dec 9 â€“ EF internships 2025 application deadline
* Dec 20 â€“ ETH Rangers application deadline
Dec 20 â€“ ETH Rangers application deadline
* Jan 20 â€“ Ethereum protocol attackathon ends
Jan 20 â€“ Ethereum protocol attackathon ends
* Jan 30-31 â€“ EthereumZuri.ch conference
Jan 30-31 â€“ EthereumZuri.ch conference
* Feb 23 - Mar 2 â€“ ETHDenver
Feb 23 - Mar 2 â€“ ETHDenver

Apr 4-6 â€“ ETHGlobal Taipei hackathon
* May 9-11 â€“ ETHDam (Amsterdam) conference & hackathon

* Jun 26-28 â€“ ETHCluj (Romania) conference
